rules.title: Challenge Event Rules

drink_order_process.title: How to Order
steps: Use the special event drink menu.
The challenge starts from the moment your first drink is served and ends when the ice completely melts (no ice refills).

event_rules.title: Event Rules
rules: Participants must wait until the ice has completely melted before ordering a new drink. We will prioritize refills, but the timing will depend on the bar’s workload. It is recommended to participate on weekdays.
The duration of the challenge will be judged by the bartender based on the ice melting. The bar reserves the right to the final interpretation.
The challenge must be completed individually. Sharing drinks with others during the challenge will result in disqualification, and no refunds will be provided.

rewards.title: The Prize
rewards: Total Volume Champion: The participant who drinks the most during the event → Receives one free drink from the special menu each day during the specified period.
Single Round Champion: The participant who drinks the most with a single ice cube → Receives drink vouchers equivalent to the number of drinks consumed, valid until the end of the year.
